item.description:
South Asian P.U.P Comedy, a charity fundraiser, will be held in the heart of downtown Boston’s theatre district on June 2, 2012, hosted by two top-notch Indian standup comedians who have opened for Russell Peters: Paul Varghese and Paul Singh, along with Usha Govindarajulu, the skit writer. The two-hour long program will consist of stand-up pieces by Paul V and Paul S separately as well as comedic skits and interludes written by Usha. Each Paul has extensive experience in standup comedy. All are invited to attend the best South Asian comedy event in Boston this summer!

Price
$25 per ticket ($30 at door) – part of proceeds go to charity
Ticketing: Purchase tickets at http://southasianpupcomedy.eventbrite.com
For more information:
Usha (ushaGproductions@gmail.com) or 617-429-1760


Supported by Indian Medical Association of New England (IMANE) and all charitable proceeds go to IMANE Charitable Projects
item.name: South Asian P.U.P. Comedy Show
